mapper.insert: insert into member(member_email, member_name, member_phone, member_pass, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_addrno) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPass}, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddrNo})

insert into survey(surv_no, member_email, surv_height, surv_weight, surv_eat, surv_bmi, surv_sex, surv_age, surv_lifestyle, surv_photo, surv_shape, surv_disease, surv_concern, surv_cause, surv_career) values (#{survNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{survHeight}, #{survWeight}, #{survEat}, #{survSex}, #{survAge}, #{survLifestyle}, #{survPhoto}, #{survShape}, #{survDisease}, #{survConcern}, #{survCause}, #{survCareer})
